614720.name: Fantasy Grounds - 0one's Colorprints #9: Woodland Glades (Map Pack)
614720.description:
one's Colorprints #9: Woodland Glades
Map Module for Fantasy Grounds II
Four gorgeous maps for you to enhance your wilderness encounters. Set your deadly
traps in the orcs' encampment, place your spectral undead in the ruined manor, challenge
your players with the enigmatic lake hermit or let them face the cultists in the
monolith glade.
This Colorprint contains the following maps:
Hermit's Hut
Deep in the woods lives an hermit who built an hut over an ancient pond. It is said
that a sunken temple is hidden below the murky waters but no one has seen it yet...
Ruined Manor
The ruined manor once belonged to a wealthy duke who was a powerful sorcerer too.
The goblins of the forest attacked the manor more than once and eventually managed
to plunder it and burn it to ashes, thanks to the betrayal of one of the most trusted
duke' servant. Before his death, the duke cursed the betrayer and doomed him...
Orc Camp
The famed Crashed Skull orc warband shifts from place to place in the woods. They
often build a camp in a woodland glade and stay for few days before shifting again.
The orcs are marauders and they raid the nearby hamlets kidnapping people to sell
them to slavers...
The Monolith
The alien black monolith rises on the top of an ancient ziggurat. Nobody knows who
built the ziggurat or the monolith but both exude pure evil. A group of evil cultist
found a name, engraved at the base of the monolith...
This product is an installable module for use with the Fantasy Ground II virtual
tabletop. The map module has been carefully organized to allow the GM the easily
prepare adventures within multiple campaigns simultaneously, while still allowing
maps modules to be opened or closed as needed. Each map is linked within a an easy
to follow outline story entry, with links to the map in mutliple resolutions. This
product is usable with any ruleset. A Full license of Fantasy Grounds II is required
to use this product.
Fantasy Grounds II Conversion by 0one Games
Ruleset Compatibility: Any
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
